attributes.action: Only allow materials using less than 1.5c to plan, build or maintain human life.
attributes.additional_details:
The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Global Warming of 1.5c report published in October 2018.

To stop environmental and health issues that will be too late to stop for future generations if we do not act now.
attributes.background: Ensure that any natural or man made material used to make, produce or construct products used by humans to sourced by using materials that take less than 1.5c to produce and once produced do not (either directly or non directly) contribute to Global warming by more than 1.5c in the future.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, in particular what you mean by "products used by humans to sourced by using materials that take less than 1.5c to produce."

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you want the Government to respond to the IPCC report by bringing in specific carbon-cutting policies, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
